code: import*as ACTION_TYPES from'../constant/action-types';var initialState={username:'',password:''};export var AuthReducer=function AuthReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ACTION_TYPES.UPDATE_USER:return action.payload||false;default:return state;}};
